entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:32 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -18.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 07:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Fog dissipating. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023
